Name: Depotentiation of emotional reactivity using TMR during REM sleep
Acknowledgements: We thank Sophie Smith and Caterina Leitner for collaboration at the early and late phases of the study. We also acknowledge Sofia I.R. Pereira for her significant contribution to data collection.

GeneratedBy.Name: ezBIDS
GeneratedBy.Description: ezBIDS is a web-based tool for converting MRI datasets to BIDS, requiring neither coding nor knowledge of the BIDS specification
